mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_permission ( id, code, name, memo, type, creator_fk, updater_fk, date_create, date_update, valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{memo}, #{type}, #{creator_fk}, #{updater_fk}, now(), now(), #{isValid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_permission SET code=#{code}, name=#{name}, memo=#{memo}, updater_fk=#{updater_fk}, date_update=now(), type=#{type}, valid=#{isValid} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, code, name, memo, type, (CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN '菜单' ELSE '其它' END) AS typeName, date_create, date_update, valid, (CASE WHEN valid = 1 THEN '启用' ELSE '停用' END) AS status, (select realName from ums_user u where u.id = p.creator_fk ) as creator, (select realName from ums_user u where u.id = p.updater_fk ) as updater FROM sys_permission p WHERE id=#{id}
